channel.title: Editing
channel.description: Post topics relating to mapping, modeling, etc. here.

item.title: New UnWheel 2 Development
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded: We have a great coder and Kismet genuis who is adding alot of functionality. He is trying to add a dash and gauges at the moment. More to come.....

item.title: Monte Carlo of Monaco
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
I have been busy the last few weeks with my new map, the Monte Carlo Grand Prix. What is in the level so far is under 36,000 polys.
Figuring out the elevations and different buildings can be maddening, the city is different ever year

It's finished. http://www.fileplanet.com/files/200000/204543.shtml

item.title: NeoNautica's Random Art
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNautica)
item.dc:creator: NeoNautica
item.content:encoded:
Whenever I make something interesting I'll throw it in this thread

Submission 1:

Got the stuff inside the store and tweaked some of the exterior colors. The signs and strips on the building pulse, hence the different colors in each shot. Lighting could still use some tweaking, but I'll save that for another time.

Note: The interior is pure deco (player can not get inside, but they can run around and on top of the building)....

NeoNautica's Random Art

item.title: Tutorial for creating cars?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Camorra2084)
item.dc:creator: Camorra2084
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

i managed to download the mod, after trying for about half a year (i finally realized how to use a download manager )

My question is, if someone can tell me how to build an own car. I already made a model with uv and textures and i know how to import it into ut04 as a static mesh or as an animated mesh.
I already imported it as a replacement of an existing car, and got it into the game. But there are some problems:
1. it won't move (guess it is something about "karma",...

Tutorial for creating cars?

item.title: Screenshot!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded:
Ok, I know it's not much, but it's a start shot of my latest map (as yet un-named), anyone able to think of anything good for it?

Also, I am short on ideas for set-pieces. I want to flex my Kismet muscles guys!

item.title: Current Models
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded: Here is my work from the last two days. I have a second UV channel for the editor to use for lightmaps. The center image shows my old and new elevator, with vertex lighting. The three around the sides show the new grain elevator with lightmapping.

item.title: New Formula in Game
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded: The formula is the last vehicle for UnWheel 2 phase one. Now we will focus on coding and environments. Note, a new record for top speed

item.title: I would like to ask a question...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wolfish)
item.dc:creator: Wolfish
item.content:encoded:
Sorry if I put this in the wrong area...
I recently downloaded this mod, and have loved it so far. I like the Urban Static Meshes and Textures so much, that I would like to know if I could use them in an Assault mapping project. I will not get paid for it, and this might end up on a server, so I just wanted to know. If so I can give the members a copy of this map, I will put the needed copyrights in the description, and anything else.

Anyways great job with the mod!
(It's 2 a.m....

I would like to ask a question...

As the mods that are on my server dont...

Unwheel Maps

item.title: what have I been working on then?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded:
Well I've been silent for quite some time now and you guys might be wondering what massive project I've undertaken. You might be a little excited. Unfortunately up until now I have done NOTHING. Sure I made some textures using MapZone a while back (I seriously recommend this to anybody) but in the last three months: zilch.

The reasons are many:

a) University - I'm studying computer science (mainly programming) and have had little time to work on UnWheel

b) UnrealEd - It's always...

what have I been working on then?

item.title: 2004 Audi A4
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNautica)
item.dc:creator: NeoNautica
item.content:encoded:
Note: the 2004 is the year of the car, not the version of unreal.

Started working on this a few days ago and its on track to meet my 15,000 triangle limit. Sitting at 8,000 Tris right now.





...

2004 Audi A4

item.title: [BETA] New beta update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shrimp)
item.dc:creator: Shrimp
item.content:encoded:
Get it here

You should ONLY get this if you ALREADY have the last beta (the big one). To anyone else - I'm afraid this file is useless to you, please don't download it .

Changes include:

  • You can spectate (view other players, though not fly around) once you complate a race or are wrecked in wrecker.
  • Slower damage in "contact" gametypes, like CTF, Rabbit, etc.
  • Option to disable the real-time reflections....

[BETA] New beta update

item.title: The Offical [BETA] UW Feedback thread...
item.author: invalid@example.com ($n][pErMan)
item.dc:creator: $n][pErMan
item.content:encoded: Well I did not see one so I took the liberty of making one! Post everything about it here... what you like and/or dislike or what you managed to break! I hope to have a beta server up soon so we can test online... I PM'ed shimp a few questions first though so I can get it setup properly.

item.title: New UnWheel Vehicle
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded: Here is my current project, a new vehicle. This is for all of us who were never properly cared for as babies, but were carried instead of being pushed.

item.title: UnWheel, on PSP!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Diego1203)
item.dc:creator: Diego1203
item.content:encoded:
Jerdaygo and I have been fooling around with some code for quite some time now just for fun, we never thought we would get this to work but here it is, a video of a horribly unstable and buggy version of UnWheel running in real time on the Sony PSP! The sound is buggy, the multiplayer doesn't work, and most of the maps are too big to fit in the PSP's memory, but it works!

It's a rather promising turn of events, and with enough development time we could have a "Lite" version of UnWheel...

UnWheel, on PSP!!

item.title: Car Selection Screen and Spawning...
item.author: invalid@example.com (McDazzler)
item.dc:creator: McDazzler
item.content:encoded:
Hey Guys
Cool mod! I am interested in doing a mod involving cars and want to achieve the car selection screen and spawn in the car that you guys have achieved. I would greatly appreciate some help from those in the know if they could point me in the direction of achieving this.

I have looked on wiki's and other forums and thus far have achieved spawning in a small level in a car pre determined in UED with a PlayerSpawnManager. I want to go beyond that and select the car ingame like you...

Car Selection Screen and Spawning...
